title: Macau Gaming Revenue Misses Estimates in Surprising Slowdown
description: Macau’s gaming revenue rose 14.8% in December, missing analyst expectations, in a sign that growth in the world’s biggest gambling hub might have lost some steam.
content: Macau’s gaming revenue rose 14.8% in December, missing analyst expectations, in a sign that growth in the world’s biggest gambling hub might have lost some steam.
